text: [Ej mu'minon] Sumoro ci pes omadaast, ki dar mavridi [tarzi raftor ʙo] munofiqon du guruh sudaed, hol on ki Alloh taolo ononro ʙa xotiri on ci ancom dodaand, sarnagun soxta [va ʙa kufru gumrohi ʙozgardonda] ast? Ojo mexohed, kasero, ki Alloh taolo gumroh kardaast, hidojat kuned? Va [-le] har kiro Alloh taolo gumroh kunad, rohe [ʙa suji hidojat] ʙarojas naxohi joft
